EmailTemplate.name: Bank of Internet(Retirement Services) Case Creation Autoreply
EmailTemplate.subject: Bank of Internet Customer Service has received your submission!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Bank of Internet.
This is an automatic acknowledgement to let you know that we have received your inquiry. You can expect a response to your inquiry within 2 business days. If your request is more urgent, you may also receive immediate assistance by contacting us at 1-877-247-8002. Do not reply directly to this message, there will be no response.
Your inquiry has been assigned Case ID {!Case.CaseNumber}. Additionally, you may see a unique identifier automatically included in all subsequent emails. Please do not remove this code from future communications.
